display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): (Apneas with >= 2% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 2% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hours of REM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in rapid eye movement sleep (REM) associated with >= 2% desaturation) / (hours of rapid eye movement sleep (REM))]
calculation: 60*(hrembp2 + hrop2 + carbp2 + carop2 + oarbp2 + oarop2 + marbp2 + marop2) / minremp
